text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS75 Stealth-479 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS75 Stealth-479 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GS Series GS75 Stealth-479 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS75 Stealth-479 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the MSI GS Series GS75 Stealth-479 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
